attributes.title: Awful! The absolute worst app you can download! It costed the life of my catğŸ˜¡
attributes.review: I was so excited to download an app that allows me to keep up with my respectful president, however when i opened the app my phone was spammed with so many messages!! This aggravating because i have an older model which will freeze and overheat faster than other phones. My phone froze due to all the messages I got and my phone overheated in my hand!!! ğŸ˜¡ It got so hot that it burned my fingers and i dropped it. It landed on my cat who is 16 years old with severe heart disease. My cat was so scared that he had a heart attack!! I tried calling local animal hospitals to try and save my baby, but due to Abbottâ€™s reopening to early and covid cases rising, they were all closed. The absolute love of my life died right there due to some stupid app! I was so devastated that i picked up the phone and chucked it out the window. I left it there and never wanted to see it ever again. After 30 minutes of mourning my poor babyâ€™s death, i smelled something burning. I was so confused and started looking all over the house to see whatâ€™s burning. I look outside and what did i see??? I saw a fire spreading to my house from the phone that over heated due to this app! I quickly grabbed my cats corpse and ran outside. I was a heaping sobbing mess all because of an app!! My cat died and everything i owned went up in flames. I never knew how awful an app could be, until i downloaded this app. I will never support this man again after his app took everything from me.
